section.heading: Indemnity.
section.text: An insurer shall not be liable for the following:

para.text: Damages or restitution provided by this subchapter, either jointly, severably, or as a third party, for insurance fraud offense committed by an insured; or
The defense of an insured or other person who is charged with insurance fraud.

annotations.annotation: as added Apr. 27, 1999, D.C. Law 12-273, § 2, 46 DCR 1132
